Method Detail

execute

public void execute(PingProtocolType protocol,
                    int iteration)
Gets all devices from the database that should be pinged this iteration with a specified protocol. Each device is pinged and the result is sent to the database. The device database table is also updated with the current status of the device.

Parameters:
protocol - - Ping protocol to use, specified by PingProtocolType
interation - - used to determine which devices should be pinged during this pass. Use -1 to ping all devices with protocol ping enabled
